scripts.deploy:amplitude: TARGET_URL=https://api.amplitude.com gcloud functions deploy amplitude-proxy --entry-point proxy --runtime nodejs16 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --timeout=60s
scripts.deploy:segment: TARGET_URL=https://api.segment.io gcloud functions deploy segment-proxy --entry-point proxy --runtime nodejs16 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --timeout=60s
